name: Crashing Cosmo
description:
Crashing Cosmo! Our hero Cosmo crashes on an unknown alien world! Can our hero rebuild his ship and escape the clutches of the evil aliens! It's up to you to guide our hero and find the resources to build your ship before you are overrun! Good luck out there Cadet!

 Game designers -Nick Leslie -Joe Gram -Cam Evans

controls: 

LEFT CLICK to attack, 

RIGHT-CLICK to place turrets(if you have them)

 E to interact/pick up

TAB to open shop

ESCAPE TO PAUSE

GOAL: pick up materials from the four corners of the map and deposit them into your ship.

WARNING: aliens will attack your ship while you are not there so Leave turrets to defend it.

THINGS SPAWN EVERY 10 SECONDS

source code: https://github.com/swordcom367/bullet-hell-gamejam
